reviews.text:
Don't normally use trains got one on Friday working with teenager going into Piccadilly visiting museums/galleries.

Had a great day until go back couldn't get through gates apparently it was 4.05 and I had a off peak ticket. I was not offered one or choice at Ashton so had to pay £5.40 on top or wait till 6.30 if I'd known I would have made sure I was back at Victoria in time as staff stipulated at Victoria they should always ask!!!
Had to take a train from here and to be honest not the best station I have ever been at. Even though still give it 4 stars for it kind of charm.

After traveling yesterday from blackpool 1st march.i was shocked to find this station closed at 1.07 ,but not gritted at all very slippery.my wife wanted to use the lift as she was scared to go down the ramp.it was out of service.so had to use the ramp,it was extreamly slippy,why no grit was dosn is beyond belief...very bad and cold station
Sometimes the station is manned and sometimes it's not. The staff are more responsive when it's not
